main.game.object.champion

Class Champion

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.game.object.GameObject
      • main.game.object.champion.Champion

  • public class Champion
extends main.game.object.GameObject
    Class that represents a Champion.
    Version:
    17 sep. 2015
    Author:
    ikhebgeenaccount

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Champion()
      Default constructor, creates a GameObject with size (50, 100) and sets the following default value: - speed : 8 - defaultSpeed : 8 - maxHealth : 300

    • Method Detail

      • castQ

        public boolean castQ(main.game.coordinate.Coordinate startCoordinate,
                     boolean movedLeft)
        This method is used to fire this Champion's Q spell. Returns true if firing is succesfull, otherwise false. False means the spell is still on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        startCoordinate - The Coordinate from where the spell should be fired.
        movedLeft - Decides which way the spell is fired. False means to the right, true means to the left.
        Returns:
        boolean fired

      • castW

        public boolean castW(main.game.coordinate.Coordinate startCoordinate,
                     boolean movedLeft)
        This method is used to fire this Champion's W spell. Returns true if firing is succesfull, otherwise false. False means the spell is still on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        startCoordinate - The Coordinate from where the spell should be fired.
        movedLeft - Decides which way the spell is fired. False means to the right, true means to the left.
        Returns:
        boolean fired

      • castE

        public boolean castE(main.game.coordinate.Coordinate startCoordinate,
                     boolean movedLeft)
        This method is used to fire this Champion's E spell. Returns true if firing is succesfull, otherwise false. False means the spell is still on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        startCoordinate - The Coordinate from where the spell should be fired.
        movedLeft - Decides which way the spell is fired. False means to the right, true means to the left.
        Returns:
        boolean fired

      • castR

        public boolean castR(main.game.coordinate.Coordinate startCoordinate,
                     boolean movedLeft)
        This method is used to fire this Champion's R spell. Returns true if firing is succesfull, otherwise false. False means the spell is still on cooldown.

        Returns:
        boolean fired

      • getRemainingCooldown

        public long getRemainingCooldown(int spell)
        This method returns the remaining cooldown of specified spell.
        Parameters:
        spell - Constant that represents one of the four available spell. Constants can be found in Class Spell.
        Returns:
        long remainingCooldown

      • setCastOffSet

        public void setCastOffSet(int offSet)
        The cast offset is a Coordinate that gets added to the startCoordinate of every spell. This means that the offset is basicly from where the spell gets fired relative to the character. The x offset is default to half of the character's width, the y coordinate is customizable per Champion.
        Parameters:
        offSet - The off set for the y coordinate.
